before_use:
This calculator includes inputs based on race, which may or may not provide better estimates, so we have decided to make race optional. See here for more on our approach to addressing race and bias on MDCalc.

For the same other inputs, this calculator estimates higher risk of HIV prevalence in Hispanic and Black patients.

seo.meta_description_en: The Denver HIV Risk Score predicts probability of undiagnosed HIV infection.

creator_info.about_en: Jason S. Haukoos, MD, is the research director of the emergency medicine department at Denver Health Medical Center. He is also an associate professor of emergency medicine at the University of Colorado Denver. Dr. Haukoos' primary research is focused on hospital and infectious disease epidemiology, and HIV/AIDS screening.
